D

doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.approveAppointments
approveAppointment serverlets, this is used to approve appointments made by either a doctor or patient

First, an appID is retrived from the dropdown on the secretary page using the getParameter() method
Next, a appointment is created to access the deserialize() method and an arraylist created based on the output from that method
Next, a for loop is used to itterate through the arraylist to find the appointment that matches the ID retrived.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.approvePatient
approveAppointment serverlets, this is used to approve patients that have been created

First, an patientID is retrived from the dropdown on the secretary page using the getParameter() method
Next, a patient is created to access the deserialize() method and an arraylist created based on the output from that method
Next, a for loop is used to itterate through the arraylist to find the patient that matches the ID retrived.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.createPrescription
 
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.CreateUser
CreateUser Serverlet, this is used to create a user based upon information inputed on the create user page

First, all relevant attributes are retrieved from the CreateUser.jsp page using the getParameter() method.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.feedback
feedback serverlet, this is used to give feedback to a given doctor

First, all relevant attributes are retrieved from the page using the getParameter() method.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.Login
Login Serverlet, this is used to manage access to the system by created users

First, the Username and Password values are retrived from the login page using the getParameter() method
Next, a check is made to determine the first letter of the Users ID, this allows the proper handling of user access and which page to navigate to.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.makeAppointmentNotes
makeAppointmentNotes serverlets, this is used to add notes to previously created appointments

First, an appID is retrived from the dropdown on the secretary page using the getParameter() method, the contents of the note is also captured in this way.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.orderMedicine
orderMedicine serverlet, this is used to create medicine, register observers and notify observers

First, all relevant attributes are retrieved from the page using the getParameter() method.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.removeAccounts
removeAccounts serverlet, this is used to remove doctor, secretary, and patient accounts

First, a check is made to deterimine which dropdown is being used.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.requestAppointment
requestAppointment serverlet, this is used to request appointments, this is used by doctors and patients

First, all relevant attributes are retrieved from the page using the getParameter() method.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.requestTermination
requestTermination serverlet, this is used by the patient to request termination of their account

First, a HttpSession object is created based on the current session
Next, a userID string is defined from the attribute stored in the session variable "userID"
Next, a patient is created and an arraylist is generated from its deserialize() method
Next, a for loop is used to itterate through the array to find the User that matches the user ID captured.
doGet(HttpServletRequest, HttpServletResponse) - Method in class Serverlets.stockMedicine
stockMedicine serverlet, this is used to add stock to a given medicine

First, all relevant attributes are retrieved from the page using the getParameter() method.
